details: The RT Easy Builder â€“ Advanced addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the social URL parameter in all versions up to, and including, 2.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
